name: places/ChIJ7XJ8S_31wokRbA7kvwY6hXg
adrFormatAddress: 2295 1st Ave., New York, NY 10035, USA

originalText.text: This is the best laundromat in NYC. The employees are all very nice and welcoming. Open 24 hours! One time I accidentally left my favorite sweatshirt there to dry instead of in the machine. I forgot it for a whole day and they know me so well that they saved it for me!! I would have been so upset if someone took it or it got lost but they are honest and saved it for me :) GREAT service and wonderful neighborhood feeling!

text.text: This is the best laundromat in NYC. The employees are all very nice and welcoming. Open 24 hours! One time I accidentally left my favorite sweatshirt there to dry instead of in the machine. I forgot it for a whole day and they know me so well that they saved it for me!! I would have been so upset if someone took it or it got lost but they are honest and saved it for me :) GREAT service and wonderful neighborhood feeling!

originalText.text: I can’t let this night end without giving accolades to Ms. Gloria. She is a lovely and honest individual. I forgot some valuables in the drying section of the Laundry and between Ms. Gloria and another trustworthy customer I was able to collect them. Thank you Ms. Gloria for your compassion, gems like you are rare. Continue to have a heart of gold. I will always recommend this place of business just because a person like Ms. Gloria is the attendant there. I hope management treats her well.

originalText.text: I have been using the machines in this place for a long time and lately I have seen how the cleaning of the premises has been forgotten.  You have to be attentive to your belongings so that you are not taking cockroaches into your home.  I can say that even some managers have a somewhat unpleasant attitude, I can mention an older Hispanic woman, who only speaks Spanish to those who like her, to those who do not like her, she speaks English and is very rude in her treatment of the clients.  Too bad it was a good place open 24/7.

originalText.text:
Pros: Nice, acceptably new machines, wash dry fold service, open 24 hours, attendant there during typical business hours + Saturday and Sundays, friendly, helpful fella. Clean and maintained facility.

Cons, due to no fault of the owner: Machines don't accept dollar coins, and the aisle with the dryers is /extremely/ cramped and and uncomfortably packed with customers who are annoyed by your request to squeeze through....

originalText.text: I been washing clothes since they renovated that place. The only thing is that the machine needs to be changed. It has ac. Before they were table and chairs after the pandemic they removed them..
